articles.author: Yaseen Rana
articles.title: Brydon Carse Banned From Cricket After Admitting To Betting Offences | England News - Wisden
articles.description: Brydon Carse has been banned after an investigation by the Cricket Regulator found that he had placed bets on 303 cricket matches between 2017 and 2019.
articles.content:
Brydon Carse has been banned after an investigation by the Cricket Regulator found that he had placed hundreds of bets on cricket matches between 2017 and 2019.
